See also: Antworten

German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

From Middle High German [Term?], from Old High German antwurten, from Proto-Germanic *andawurdijaną.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈantvɔʁtən/
  • audio
    		(file)
  • Hyphenation: ant‧wor‧ten

Verb[edit]

antworten (third-person singular simple present antwortet, past tense antwortete, past participle geantwortet, auxiliary haben)

  1. (intransitive) to answer, to reply
    Der König antwortete: „Wenn es einen solchen Menschen gibt, dann muss er verrückt sein.”
    The King answered, "If such a man exists, I think he must be mad."
